sentence.Network_en: The rape trial was sensationally halted yesterday.
sentence.Network_cn: 这起强奸案的审理昨天在群情激愤中暂停了。

sentence.Network_en: Newspapers reported the incident sensationally, making it appear worse than it really was.
sentence.Network_cn: 报纸大肆渲染这件事,描述得更不像话.

sentence.Network_en: However Gattuso has sensationally come out against the 28 - year - old's signature.
sentence.Network_cn: 然而加图索已经公开的站出来反对签下这名28 岁 的球员.

list.abs: omit scrupulously 谨慎地删掉omit sensationally 合理地删掉omit successively 连续删掉
...上多被归類为软性新闻， 也常被认为是不登大雅之堂的煽情(sensationalism) 的新闻划上等号。
American TV tabloid news programs like Hard Copy use sensationalism to attract viewers ., 美国的花边电视新闻如 < 硬拷贝 > 等利用渲染手法来吸引观众.
American TV tabloid news programs like Hard Copy use sensationalism to attract viewers ., 美国的花边电视新闻如 < 硬拷贝 > 等利用渲染手法来吸引观众.
price reasonably 定价合理price sensationally 定价惊人price sensibly 定价合理

entry.tran: (结果、事件、局势)轰动性的，引起哗然的
entry.def: A sensational result, event, or situation is so remarkable that it causes great excitement and interest.

example.ex: The world champions suffered a sensational defeat.
example.tran: 世界冠军遭遇惨败，引起了一片哗然。

entry.tran: (故事、报道)耸人听闻的，哗众取宠的
entry.def: You can describe stories or reports as sensational if you disapprove of them because they present facts in a way that is intended to cause feelings of shock, anger, or excitement.
You can describe something as sensational when you think that it is extremely good.

example.ex: Experts agreed that this was a truly sensational performance.
example.tran: 专家们一致认为这的确是一场精彩绝伦的演出。

sentences.sentence: "in the summer of 1958 the pianist had a sensationally triumphant return"

auth_sentence.content: In the hands of the right director, it can be sensationally successful.
auth_sentence.res_content: In the hands of the right director, it can be sensationally successful.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: In the hands of the right director, it can be sensationally successful.

auth_sentence.content: Unlike his characters, however, Odets killed himself not sensationally but by degrees.
auth_sentence.res_content: Unlike his characters, however, Odets killed himself not sensationally but by degrees.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Unlike his characters, however, Odets killed himself not sensationally but by degrees.

auth_sentence.content: Then in December the same year, Frank Bruno's mental health problems were sensationally labelled with "Bonkers Bruno Locked Up".
auth_sentence.res_content: Then in December the same year, Frank Bruno's mental health problems were sensationally labelled with "Bonkers Bruno Locked Up".
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Then in December the same year, Frank Bruno's mental health problems were sensationally labelled with "Bonkers Bruno Locked Up".
